ValidationRule.description: ensures that the Address field is filled out
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(
NOT(ISPICKVAL( Status, "Open" )), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Status, "Closed" )), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Status, "Unqualified" )), OR( ISBLANK(Street), ISBLANK(City), ISBLANK(State), ISBLANK(PostalCode), ISBLANK(Country) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: A Full Address is Required: Street, City, State, Postal Code, & Country cannot be blank
